section.p: The boat is so waterlogged that you have to abandon it and swim to the quayside. An old man carrying a lobster pot helps you up and you ask him where you are.
He points along an avenue lined with strange black statues. At the far end is a city of many high turrets, the stone gleaming like gold under an indigo sky.
‘This is Braelak Isle. Yon city is Dweomer.’
